channel.title: Help Me! - Donate Points - Model - Mystery Box Donating -Please Help
channel.description:
Ok
So the First Thing Is :
I got a source and i want if they donate the get automaticly donation points on server

Now
2: Model
I Got a dragon whip fully working only when i use it it gets bugged and glitched , i cant see my self when i use it . i need help plz
3.Mystery box . i got it but i want to add like items on it ehm like death cape i got the model and everything but how do i ad it on mystery box so it is like 10 % chance of getting it please help me i got some weapons there is in mystery box when they buy it is 10% chance of get items but i want help to add a item on it
PLEASE HELP ME I BEG U ADD ME - post under ur msn and i add u I NEED A CODER TOO PLEASE ADD ME :rolleyes:

item.title: Help Me! - Donate Points - Model - Mystery Box Donating -Please Help
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

For the first one you need it so that the online site that your using for the transaction of money send an email with a pin to the person. I believe Plimus have the ability to do that.

For the mystery box go to the item.java and make a new array and add to it then call it.

Like this

public static int crackers[] = { 1038, 1039, 1040 };

Read full topic
